attributes.additional_details:
Sadiq Khan has now caused animosity between the BRITs and the Americans, when most of us find this behaviour childish and unacceptable and did not
Support his actions.  We need a Major that
Is going to listen to the people of London not use his status to and personal feelings representing us all.  He needs to stand down.
attributes.background:
Donald trump was invited to visit London and Sadiq Khan allowed a giant baby balloon to fly in Westminster.  This is totally unacceptable, disrespectful and embarrassing.  He has used his power to
Intimidate Donald Trump.

rejection.details: The Mayor of London is elected by the people of London, not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.
